Class CharaSelectViewModelBase

Namespace
neo_bpsys_wpf.Abstractions.ViewModels
Assembly
neo-bpsys-wpf.dll

用于选择角色的角色选择器行为的基类 需要派生类所做的是:
1.设置CharaList
2.设置IsEnabled
3.实现SyncChara()

public abstract class CharaSelectViewModelBase : ObservableRecipient, INotifyPropertyChanged, INotifyPropertyChanging
